products.title: Autumn Wood Butterscotch Curtain

This curtain is a firm favourite and will go down a hit with little ones. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Geometric Metallic Cream Curtain
products.description: A fantastic neutral, this textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. Your new geometric metallic cream curtain,blends a warm cream shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtaincomes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Dragonfly Linen Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This linen dragonfly curtain, in a soft cream colour, makes this muted curtain a must for insect and neutral lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly linen curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Linen Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a creamy linen blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee linen curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Ivory Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary, soft hues. Classic traditional design, on a soft off-white ivory background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee ivory curtain is suitable.

products.title: Artichoke Linen Curtain
products.description: Their artichoke curtain, inspired by the favourite european vegetable, blends reds and greens together on a light cream linen background to create a classic pattern with a modern twist. Perfect for adding flair to a kitchen or dining room. A cotton/linen blend fabric, makes this curtain breathable and light - wonderful for temperature regulation. Not only is this curtain made in yorkshire by us, we also offer a fantastic five year guarantee on this product.
